short_summary: This requirement is for: Indigenous Services Canada (ISC)This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 1 for the following category:Stream 2. Business Consulting / Change ManagementCategory: 2.6 Change Management Consultant – (2) Senior
description: Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) is seeking to obtain the services of two (2) Change Management Consultants at Senior level to support the team to analyze existing processes and new processes coming out from business process mapping work, develop plans and strategies to best implement the newly designed process and procedures.",
